# The `DwarfUnit` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This dwarf writer support class manages information associated with a source file. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This dwarf writer support class manages information associated with a source file.

Definition at line 35 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfunit-h">DwarfUnit.h</a>.

Add a string attribute data and value.

We always emit a reference to the string pool instead of immediate strings so that DIEs have more predictable sizes. In the case of split dwarf we emit an index into another table which gets us the static offset into the string table.

### getParentContextString() {#aace6bf1aa397a8c6f9b832c8a39b8b6c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::string DwarfUnit::getParentContextString (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/discope">DIScope</a> &#42; Context) const</>}>
Get string containing language specific context for a global name.

Walks the metadata parent chain in a language specific manner (using the compile unit language) and returns it as a string. This is done at the metadata level because DIEs may not currently have been added to the parent context and walking the DIEs looking for names is more expensive than walking the metadata.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfunit-h/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfunit-h">DwarfUnit.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfunit-cpp/#l00699">699</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfunit-cpp">DwarfUnit.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ContainingTypeMap {#a6acc4d4cea1d5a8e8ed6b63151c160db}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;DIE &#42;, const DINode &#42;&gt; llvm::DwarfUnit::ContainingTypeMap</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
This map is used to keep track of subprogram DIEs that need DW&#95;AT&#95;containing&#95;type attribute.

This attribute points to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> that corresponds to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> mapped with the subprogram <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.

</MemberDefinition>
